name: Technical Machine TS-2
author: Ryo Ueda

attacks.name: Devoluter
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent’s Evolved Pokémon (excluding Pokémon LV.X). Remove the highest Stage Evolution card from that Pokémon and put that card back into your opponent’s hand.

rule_box: Attach this card to 1 of your Pokémon in play. That Pokémon may use this card’s attack instead of its own.
